mapper.sql: id, tool_disinfection_id, operator, tool_name, tool_num, disinfection_way, create_time, update_time
mapper.update:
UPDATE tool_disinfection_item
tool_disinfection_id = #{toolDisinfectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tool_name = #{toolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tool_num = #{toolNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
disinfection_way = #{disinfectionWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
